dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Threadneedle Press
dmca.body:
Threadneedle Press

Fax 

To: Google - Blogger DMCA Complaints From: Cynthia Ewer, Threadneedle Press LLC 
Fax: 509-628-2492 Pages: 1 
Phone: Date: 3/24/2007 
Re: Infringement Notification CC: 

My name is Cynthia Ewer, and I am owner of OrganizedHome.com. I am also managing director for Threadneedle Press LLC, which holds copyright to all works published at our site network.

Contact e-mail: legal@organizedhome.com
 
It has come to my attention that this Blogger post contains infringing material copied from our site:

http://4everclean.blospot.com/2007/03/magic-minimum.html 

This article is substantially similar to, and presumably copied from, our copyrighted article:

http://organizedhome.com/content-9.html
 
Our article is original work, written by me, and published subject to copyright notice. No publication permission has been granted to the owner of this blog.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
 
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


Cynthia Townley Ewer, Editor

OrganizedHome.Com
